name: For Loop

inputs.name: Enter
inputs.description: The input execution that triggers this node

inputs.name: First
inputs.description: The first index of the loop

inputs.name: Last
inputs.description: The last index of the loop

inputs.name: Step
inputs.description: The incremental value for each iteration

outputs.name: Exit
outputs.description: Execute the next node when the loop has completed

outputs.name: Body
outputs.description: Execute the next node in each iteration

outputs.name: Index
outputs.description: The current index of the loop

description: Execute a loop in one frame for each index between the first index and the last index.
